segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, her arm raised expectantly toward her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sweet moment of sibling cooperation, but it’s also fraught with danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the boy stretches for the cookie jar is downright reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t he realize how likely it is that he will tip over?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And here I am, just watching this unfold, my heart racing at the thought of a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would glance over her shoulder, to see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she’s too focused on her plate, polishing it as if it’s the most important task in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR
